titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should give high priority to pursuing acceptance by both the United States and the Soviet Union of compulsory jurisdiction of the International Court of Justice.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/12/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should give high priority to pursuing the acceptance by both the United States and the Soviet Union of the compulsory jurisdiction of the International Court of Justice.
